title: Tammy Hembrow flaunts abs and toned derrière
text:
She has denied claims that her toned derrière is fake.

And Tammy Hembrow proudly took to Instagram on Monday to show off her 'natural' booty and washboard stomach, to promote her fitness app.

A short clip saw the 25-year-old posing from various angles in her Queensland home, in just a pink crop top and grey Brazilian-cut briefs.

Just bootyful! Tammy Hembrow, 25, flaunted her washboard abs and 'natural' derrière, in a short clip shared to Instagram on Monday

Tammy twisted her svelte figure around to show off her posterior in the video.

Her blonde tresses were tied in braids, and her makeup included bold brows, a false set of lashes and a matte nude lipstick.

Tammy wrote in the caption: 'NATURAL BOOTY CHECKKKK (sic). I look low-key grumpy, but I just woke up.'

The mother-of-two went on to detail the benefits of downloading her app, including home and gym programs, a calorie calculator and tailored meal plans.

Revealing: The fitness influencer posed from various angles in her Queensland home, in just a pink crop top and grey Brazilian-cut briefs

'Natural booty check': Tammy went on to detail the benefits of downloading her fitness app, including home and gym programs, a calorie calculator and tailored meal plans

In August 2018, Tammy told US Cosmopolitan magazine that being accused of getting butt implants is 'frustrating'.

'I don't want people to think they can't achieve a booty with hard work,' she said.

Tammy has consistently maintained that her physique and 'gym booty' are the result of a strict diet and exercise routine.

Hitting back: In August 2018, Tammy told US Cosmopolitan magazine that being accused of getting butt implants is 'frustrating'

The blonde bombshell has documented her transformation in recent years, from having a flat backside to a more shapely appearance.

In August, Tammy posted two side-by-side images to her fitness app's Instagram page, drawing attention to her changing booty.

She said the results were achieved through better nutrition and using heavier weights.
description: She has denied claims that her toned derrière is fake.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
